data.approach: Add awareness of advanced options when adding a new agent. Will add an expandable Advanced Options section to the Add Agent modal that shows optional configuration fields (instructions file, startup pattern, task injection method, CLI flags) with a note linking to full configuration in Settings > Agents after adding.

data.taskTitle: Add awareness of advanced options when adding new agent harness
summary: Added expandable Advanced Options section to Add Agent modal in AgentProgramsEditor.svelte
Section includes CLI Flags editor (chip-style with add/remove), Instructions File input, and Task Injection Method dropdown
Added informational note pointing to Settings > Agents for full configuration after adding
Implemented collapsible UI with slide transition and settings icon
Reset advanced options state when closing modal or clicking Back to presets

data.taskTitle: When adding new agent harness, inform user of additional config options
summary: Added Advanced Options collapsible section to Add Agent modal
Includes CLI Flags, Instructions File, Task Injection Method
Added info note about additional settings available after adding
Enhanced AgentSelector dropdowns with provider logos and status indicators

summary: Identified user experience gap in agent harness configuration workflow
Recommended adding awareness of advanced configuration options during agent creation process
Highlighted need for better initial user guidance when adding new agent harnesses

suggestedTasks.title: Enhance New Agent Harness Configuration Onboarding UX
suggestedTasks.description:
Implement a more informative initial setup flow for new agent harnesses. Create a guided configuration wizard that:
- Explains available advanced configuration options
- Provides tooltips or inline help for complex settings
- Allows optional advanced configuration during initial agent creation
- Improves discoverability of configuration options
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve user understanding of configuration complexity during agent harness setup

patterns: Implement progressive disclosure for complex configuration interfaces
